features: Keep out of the reach of children.
Swiffer refills are recyclable, simply download a free shipping label from TerraCycle to ship your refills to a new life and get rewarded
Safe on all finished floors* *Do not use on unfinished, oiled or waxed wooden boards, non-sealed tiles or carpeted floors because they may be water sensitive.
Dissolves dirt and grime better than a mop
Unique formula traps and locks dirt deep in cloth
body.description: Product Description Swiffer Sweeper Wet mop textured cloths trap and lock dirt deep in cloth. They are safe to use on all finished floors* and have a scrubbing strip to remove tough spots. *Do not use on unfinished, oiled or waxed wooden boards, non-sealed tiles or carpeted floors because they may be water sensitive. Amazon.com Swiffer Sweeper wet mopping cloths are designed with a unique cleaning solution that works to dissolve tough spots, dirt and grime and pull it deep into the cloth and off your floors. It's even safe to use on wood floors*. *Do not use Swiffer Sweeper wet cloths on unfinished, oiled, or waxed wooden boards, non-sealed tiles or carpeted floors. swiffer sweeper dry cloth refillsUsing deep, dirt-grabbing ridges and grooves, our Dry Cloths pick up more dirt, dust, and hair than a broom. You'll notice the difference when you see an amazing clean on virtually any surface.Swiffer Sweeper wet cloth RefillsSwiffer Wet Mopping Cloths have powerful dirt-dissolving cleansers that pull dirt from surfaces and lock it away. *DO NOT use Swiffer Sweeper Wet Cloths on unfinished, oiled, waxed wooden boards, non-sealed tiles, or carpeted floors as they may be water sensitive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are super thick and sturdy, they have a great amount of cleaning solution on them and smell amazing.I use these to clean my kitchen tile floors and my “fake” wood floors in the bathroom. They do a great job at cleaning messes & the scrub strip at the top is perfect for any dried messes.The only complaint I have is the containers aren’t resealable. The lid can be replaced but doesn’t secure well & I have had the pads dry out in the past because of this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using swiffer for years. I’ve tried other brand wet floor wipes but always come back to swiffer. Cleans well, easy to use, and smells good. It is very wet so sometimes I wring it out before I use it. If there is a lot of liquid in the container at the end, I just soak it up with the dry floor cloth and use it on my swiffer sweeper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes life easier
reviews.reviewText: So easy to use. Works great. Smells good. Easy to use and dispose if

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good value but...
reviews.reviewText: In spite of double, heavy cardboard boxing and each unit individually wrapped in plastic and each one sealed with a foil like cover with a hard plastic lid on top of that, they leaked, damaging both boxes, causing one end to cave and weaken and loosen the sealing tape. End result, a mess and without the additional solution, these will dry out quickly and not clean effectively. This negates the savings of buying a multipack on line. Safer to buy these in person at a brick and mortar store. Bought them several times here without a problem but it's hit and miss with delivery. They're a great convenient product for quick clean ups otherwise, especially with the scrubbing strip. Just beware, if you spill water on the floor, after it dries, it will be sticky. It builds up with regular use so you need to occasionally spray with a mix of water and vinegar or hydrogen peroxide and rinse mop with plain water to remove soapy build up. I use reusable mop heads to do this. There's many types available here that fit swifter mops.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value, fresh scent
reviews.reviewText: These refills are good for damp cleaning where the surface isn't too dirty, and you don't want to use a great deal of moisture. Sealed hardwood, and ceramic tiles is what we use them for. Everything dries quickly, leaves behind a nice fresh smell, and no further clean up, you just toss it away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It cleans the floor.
reviews.reviewText: It works well on the floors. The lavender fragrance might be over powering for some, as it seems to last for 2 to 3 days after cleaning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what i needed and expected
reviews.reviewText: This product is very reliable and practical. Highly recommend it for a nice quick neat floor cleaning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars easy to use and great for in between deep cleaning hard wood floors
reviews.reviewText: I love these for a "quick" mop of the entire house on wooden and tiled floors. They smell good, dry quickly, and great for in between cleaning with pine sole.
excelente para la limpieza de los pisos del hogar.
awesome product have been using for years and will continue to use

Los usamos para limpiar la casa de manera regular. Son maravillosos con los pelos de los perros. Tienen un olor muy agradable y alcanzas a limpiar al menos dos estancias de tu casa con cada paño húmedo.Tal vez hasta un pequeño departamento.Como todos los Swiffers, creo que son para dar mantenimiento a la limpieza del hogar. Tal vez para alguien sin perros ni mucha gente en casa sean suficientes.MUY recomendables.

reviews.reviewTitle: La efectividad y lo practico del producto
reviews.reviewText: El mejor producto! Muchas veces la cultura nos hace tener régimen de limpieza en casa y no nos atrevemos a probar cosas diferentes. Mi madre era una de ella y desde que compré Swiffer, hasta nos alegramos de limpiar la casa.
